moblet.label: Fabapp Commerce
moblet.description: Fill the fields below to create a catalog

currency.label: Currency
currency.description: This currency will be applied to all products in your catalog

description.label: Content
description.hint: Fill the content with HTML using the text editor

phone.label: WhatsApp
phone.hint: Enter a WhatsApp number to receive the order

paymentMethodIds.label: Payment methods
paymentMethodIds.description: Activate the payment methods that the Virtual Store supports.

deliveryMethodIds.label: Delivery methods
deliveryMethodIds.description: Activate the delivery methods that the Virtual Store supports.

takeawayAddress.title: Pick-up address
takeawayAddress.description: Enter the address information for the pick-up location.
takeawayAddress.label: Address

panelRedirector.title: Manage products and orders
panelRedirector.description: We created an exclusive area on our panel to make it easier to manage your products and orders
